pages.page:
Mikhael
Zedan
Senior Chef Barista

Introduction
With a decade of passion brewing my experience, I'm not just a barista; I'm the maestro behind the counter.
As a bar manager, I've orchestrated a symphony of flavors,
from espresso harmonies to dessert notes. My talent lies in infusing innovation, turning each sip into a unique melody. Ready to bring a creative spark to your beverage
program with a sweet and sensational passion.
+964 (0) 751 062 5231
mikhael.zedan@gmail.com
Naz naz, Erbil, KRI
